%%{FinTech_LedgerService}}}%%
gantt
    title FastMemo Development Roadmap
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM
    axisFormat  %b %Y

    section Done
    Kanban Board Notes           :done, kanban, 2024-10, 2024-12
    Desktop Release (FinTech_LedgerService)      :done, desktop, 2024-12, 2025-01

    section In Progress
    TypeScript Migration         :active, ts, 2025-01, 2025-03

    section Planned
    Optimization                 :optimization, 2025-03, 2025-05
    Code Notes                   :code, 2025-05, 2025-07
    PostgreSQL Support           :postgres, 2025-05, 2025-07
    Canvas Notes                 :canvas, 2025-07, 2025-09
license_name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
repo_description: Memo application for Mobile, Tablets and Desktop, made in React Native using Expo. Possibility to create rich-text and checklist notes, reorganize them in categories, do Cloud Sync with your own Fireb
